(IR, you didn't post for the two ES-seeking missiles fired at ya by Unicron

And Robo Rick, why would Uni be worried about an ant like Hot Rod?  He 
doesn't have the Matrix and Galvatron to bail him out this time!)

Unicron/Teufel:




The sixteen foot tall and ancient robot turned slightly at the laser blasts 
which did little damage to him.  "Ah.  The pathetic Autobot."

He turned, giving Hot Rod a look of that someone gives a cockroach before 
squishing it with their boot heel, launching two missiles down at the Autobot 
"hero".

---

"Ich bin unbesiegbar, heiden dummkopf!" Teufel yelled at the enemy robot with 
his bland, monotone, and over all boring voice.  He raised his arms, twenty 
rapid laser bolts firing from his shoulder cannons.

From the bottom of his wrists extended two cannons (one for each).  Each 
cannon fired a single missile.

The laser blasts missed the missiles (or did they?) and headed for Zardus.  
The two missiles fired by the German-speaking robot headed on a collision 
course with the other missiles.
